banner.title: Wellbeing Survey
banner.description:
This survey marks the first step in building OQEP's Mental Well-Being Program.Your open and honest feedback will play a vital role in helping us create a healthier and more supportive work environment.
Please note that all responses are strictly confidential and managed independently by Remedy.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Helping organizations and individuals understand wellbeing better.
about.description: Welcome to our Wellbeing Survey Platform! Our mission is to provide organizations and individuals with insights into mental health, productivity, and overall wellbeing. We believe that understanding your teams or personal wellbeing is the first step toward meaningful change. Through our carefully designed surveys, actionable insights, and ease of use in mind, every participant feels confident and comfortable while sharing feedback. We are committed to helping you make informed decisions that promote a happier, healthier, and more productive environment.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Empower individuals and organizations with actionable wellbeing insights.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where wellbeing is measurable, understood, and improved.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: We protect your data with the highest standards of security and confidentiality. All responses are anonymous and encrypted.

accuracy.title: Accuracy
accuracy.description: We focus on delivering reliable and precise insights. Your input is processed carefully to ensure the results truly reflect your team's wellbeing.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.description: We make the experience effortless and intuitive. Our survey is designed to be quick, clear, and easy for everyone to complete.

growth.title: Growth
growth.description: We empower organizations to evolve with meaningful insights. Our goal is to support long-term improvement and a healthier workplace culture.

journey.title: Ready to Start Your Wellbeing Journey?
journey.description: Join thousands of organizations and individuals who are using our platform to understand and improve their wellbeing.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Helping organizations and individuals understand wellbeing better.
contact.description: We are here to help you with any questions or concerns you may have. Please feel free to reach out to us at any time.

details.subtitle: Everything you need to know before starting the survey.
details.description: Our Wellbeing Survey is designed to provide actionable insights into  team wellbeing. Answer simple questions   and help create a healthier, happier environment.

stream.question: Which stream do you work in?

function.question: Which function do you work in?

department.question: Which department do you work in?

location.question: Which location do you work at?

questions.noAnswerText: Please select an answer before proceeding.
questions.missingDataText: Survey data is not available. Please restart the survey.

answer.title: Answer Questions
answer.description: Respond honestly to each question to get accurate insights. Take your time and consider each question carefully for the most meaningful results.

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: An overview of all responses with detailed insights to help the organization understand key trends and patterns.

action.title: Take Action
action.description: Insights to improve well-being within your organization and foster a healthier, more supportive work environment.

questions.title: Number of Questions
questions.description: 25-30 multiple-choice questions covering various aspects of wellbeing.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: Your responses are completely anonymous and securely encrypted. Data is aggregated to protect individual privacy, with any results containing fewer than 4 participants automatically combined with broader categories.

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.description: Understand wellbeing levels, identify areas for improvement, and gain actionable insights.
